title: What are some good songs that are not well known? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some of the good songs, which were once famous, but gradually slipping out of memory, are---- 1. Chandi ka go gol chanda.....Lyrics--Bharat Vyas, Music--S.N.Tripathi, Voice--Lata Mangeshkar- Md. Rafi, Film---Piya milan ki aas, 2. Kalpana ke ghan barsate.....Bharat Vyas, Vasant Desai, Lata--Mahendra Kapur, Amar Jyoti, 3. O nirdayi pritam.....Bharat Vyas, C.Ramchandra, Lata, Stree, 4. Aaj madhu vatas dole....Bharat Vyas, C Ramchandra, Lata--Mshendra Kapur, Stree, 5. Ho umad ghumad kar aayi re ghata...Bharat Vyas, Vasant Desai, Manna De--Lata, Do aankhen barah haath, 6. Saiyan jhuton ka bada sardar nikla----do... Lata... 7. Zindagi bhar gham judai ka....Asad Bhopali/Prem Dhawan, Hansraj Bahal, Md. Rafi, Miss Bombay, 8. Manzil wahi hai pyar ki....Shailendra, Shankar--Jaikisan, Subir Sen, Kathputli, 9. Kahan ud chale hain man pran mere.....Narendra Sharma, Sudhir Phadke, Mukesh--Asha Bhonsle, Bhabhi ki chudiyan, 10. Tum gagan ke chandrama ho...Bharat Vyas, Laksmikant--Pyarelal, Lata--Manna De, Sati Savitri, 11. Ghar aaja re ghir aayi badra sanwariya.... Shailendra, R.D.Burman, Lata, Chhote Nawab, 12. Balma mane na...Chitragupta, Lata, Opera House, 13. Sanware aaja pyar liye...Prem Dhawan, Dilip Dholakia, Lata, Private Secretary, 14. Ye barkha bahar....Shailendra, Shankar-Jaikishan, Lata-Asha, Mayur Pankh, 15. Mori payal geet sunaye...Rajender Krishna, Madan Mohan, Lata, Baap-Bete, 16. Thane kajaliya banalun...Bharat Vyas, S.N.Tripathi, Lata-Mukesh, Veer Durgadas, 17. Aa neel gagan tale pyar hum karen....Hadrat Jaypuri, Shankar-Jaikishan, Lata--Hemant Kumar, Baadshah, 18. Ai ri main to prem diwani mera dard na jane koy...Shailendra, Roshan, Lata, Naubahar, 19. Chanda re mori patiyan le ja...Pt. Madhur, Pardesi, Lata-Mukesh, Banjaran, 20. Hai jiya roye...Prem Dhawan, Hansraj Bahal, Lata, Milan, 21. Phulwa ban mahake...Shailendra, Hemant Kumar, Geeta Dutt-Suman Kalyanpur, Hum bhi insan hain, 22. Balamwa bolo na bolo na......S.Mohinder, Lata, Picnic, 23. Ek samay par do barsaten....Rajendra Krishna, Salil Chaudhary, Manna De, Jhoola, 24. Ai ghame dil kya karun...Majaz Lakhnavi, Sardar Malik, Talat Mahmud, Thokar, 25. Aapki yaad aati rahi raat bhar...Jaydev, Chhaya Ganguli, Gaman,......etc.

Many musical artists have a recognition within their field, but remain relatively unknown to a bigger audience. Here are some examples of songs that can broaden your horizon: Yasmin Levy - Locura: Israeli singer who performs Sephardic music in the Ladino language.Sevda Alekperzadeh - Goy-Gol: Singer from Azerbaijan who merges traditional mugham music with jazz and Afro-Carribean rhythms. This song is about a lake in her country.Tinariwen - Imidiwan Ma Tenam: Group from Mali with a style called the Touareg blues.Femi Kuti - Nobody Beg You: Nigerian singer who inherited his talent from his father Fela.Angélique Kidjo - Olofoofo: Singer from Benin who combines African tradition with modern western influences.Spiers & Boden - The Outlandish Knight: British folk duo later known as Bellowhead.Karan Casey - Distant Shore: Irish singer who gives a new flavor to traditional folk songs.Cristina Branco - Ai Vida: Portuguese fado singer who can express deep melancholia or saudade.Mayra Andrade - Stória, Stória: Singer from Cape Verde with a modern i,nterpretation of the traditional morna music.Anoushka Shankar & Norah Jones - Unsaid: Two daughters of Ravi Shankar, with a different mother and nationality, combine their experience in smooth jazz singing and Indian raga music on the sitar.
